casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jonathan Eugene DIXON 67P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 7, 2018 Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, For Dixon, Jonathan Eugene. M. Elizabeth Guzman, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of March 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of March 2018." Ervin, J. Recused
